document_data.name: Victuusa
document_data.mainbody: '''Victuusa''' was a [[white abishai]] in [[Avernus]], first layer of the [[Nine Hells]], in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: In order to win the most favor, Victuusa served two masters: [[Tiamat]] and [[Zariel]].
document_data.History: When the city of [[Elturel]] was transported to Avernus in the {{YearlinkName|1494}}, Victuusa masterminded the raid on the [[High Hall (Elturel)|High Hall]] cathedral. Afterward, commanding six [[human]] cultists of Zariel, it hunted through the cathedral for the leaders of the Elturian resistance, so that it could deliver their heads to Zariel in person.
